name: Cat wizard (Pragata_kiramaula)
description:
This cat wizard can read your mind.
Pick a number between 1 and 1000
If your number is higher  than the cat's guess click higher
If your number is lower than the cat's guess click lower

That is it

Note: this game is currently only available for windows.
I'll try to make it to mac too.

Another note: the instructions i put in the game was a mistake.  Just follow the instructions in this description.
